Package org.zaval.util.event

Different events related to the utilities classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EvObject This abstract class represents an event that has unique integer identifier.
ListenerSupport This abstract, utility class can be inherited with a classes that implement: Supporting list of listeners with a given type.
